name: The Gemancipator
description:
You are Crush Stonejaw, and you really really hate match-3 games. Your hatred for them was so powerful that it caused the gems from those games to come to life and start attacking you.

Destroying gems is simple, just click a set of 2 or more matching gems to shatter them. However, matching gems isn’t as easy as it used to be. Every 10 seconds, as a new wave of gems arrive, the criteria for matching gems changes, as shown in the HUD at the bottom of the screen. You must alternate between matching gems by color, shape, or facial features. It’s game over if the gems reach the end zone.

Created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 51
